## MatchAll interface

A set of expressions to evaluate in a condition that must all be true.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface MatchAll 
```

|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [all](./core.matchall.all.md) |  | [Matches](./core.matches.md) | The expressions that must all be true. |
